remarks: Partial isomorphism B of a lattice glb.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibglb.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
dibglb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibglb.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibglbN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( S C_ dom I /\ S =/= (/) ) ) -> ( I ` ( G ` S ) ) = |^|_ x e. S ( I ` x ) ) $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d K x $.
$d S x $.
$d W x $.
